sn45.10:1.2: Atha kho nandiyo paribbajako yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
sn45.10:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho nandiyo paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn45.10:1.4: “kati nu kho, bho gotama, dhamma bhavita bahulikata nibbanangama honti nibbanaparayana nibbanapariyosana”ti?
sn45.10:2.1: “Atthime kho, nandiya, dhamma bhavita bahulikata nibbanangama honti nibbanaparayana nibbanapariyosana.
sn45.10:2.4: Ime kho, nandiya, attha dhamma bhavita bahulikata nibbanangama honti nibbanaparayana nibbanapariyosana”ti.
sn45.10:2.5: Evam vutte, nandiyo paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn45.10:2.7: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
